help-file.title: "ELEMENTAL AURA"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast on an elemental plane, this spell allows the Druid to temporarily possess some properties of that plane. The specific properties vary from plane to plane, although, rumors tell that most planes possess statistical elements and many others. There is also a chance that the caster will achieve FULL elemental form, infusing them with added powers.
